# Vorbereitung

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(corrr)
```




# Korrelationen sortieren nach Absolutwert

```{r}
data(mtcars)
```


```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  select(cyl, disp, hp, mpg) %>% 
  correlate() %>% 
  select(term, mpg) %>% 
  mutate(cor_mpg_abs = abs(mpg)) %>% 
  arrange(-cor_mpg_abs)
```
